title: No More Excuses | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: No More Excuses | Joel Osteen
description:
If we want to become all that God created us to be, we have to learn to stop making excuses. The first step to victory is to take responsibility for who you are. When you resist the temptation to pass blame, God will make sure you get where you're supposed to be. 

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
